metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1649 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Null pointer dereference in libr/bin/format/mach0/mach0.c in radareorg/radare2 in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.7.0. It is likely to be exploitable. For more general description of heap buffer overflow, see [CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/476.html).

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
